Hospital.Patient

Class Diagnosis

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Patient.Diagnosis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiagnosisSecondOpinion

    public class Diagnosis
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the diagnosis for a patient

                              throws ArgumentIsNullException,
                                     CannotChangeException,
                                     CannotDoException
        Sets the treatment for this diagnosis.
        Parameters:
        treatment - The treatment to set.
        Returns:
        a description of the updated state
        Throws:
        ArgumentIsNullException - If the treatment was null.
        CannotChangeException - If the treatment was already set.
        CannotDoException - the associated treatment was already scheduled

      • updateState

        protected java.lang.String updateState()
                                throws CannotDoException
        (Un)Schedules the treatment depending on whether the treatment can be started
        Returns:
        a description of the updated state, "" if nothing happened
        Throws:
        CannotDoException - the treatment could not be (un)scheduled

      • removeTreatment

        public java.lang.String removeTreatment(Treatment t)
                                 throws WrongTreatmentException,
                                        CannotDoException
        Removes the treatment. The treatment to remove must be known.
        Parameters:
        t - The treatment to try to remove.
        Returns:
        a description of the new state
        Throws:
        WrongTreatmentException - If the Treatment that tried to be removed was not set in this diagnosis.
        CannotDoException - the treatment was not yet scheduled

      • hasTreatment

        public boolean hasTreatment()
        Return true if this Diagnosis has an associated Treatment.
        Returns:
        true if this Diagnosis has an associated Treatment.

      • advancedString

        public java.lang.String advancedString()
        Returns a description with all information of this diagnosis.
        Returns:
